gov.cms.qrda.validator.web.service

Class SchematronCategoryServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.cms.qrda.validator.web.service.CommonUtilsImpl
      • gov.cms.qrda.validator.web.service.SchematronCategoryServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchematronCategoryService

    @Service
public class SchematronCategoryServiceImpl
extends CommonUtilsImpl
implements SchematronCategoryService
    This class is the implementation class for the SchematronCategoryService interface. It handles all of the reading and writing of files used in the QRDA Validator application. the files used by the application are stored in the QRDA_HOME/qrda file space on the server running the application.
    Author:
    Dan Donahue, ESAC Inc.
    See Also:
    SchematronCategoryService
